title: WATCH: Pog surprises Ibra, Henry
text:
Paul Pogba gatecrashes Thierry Henry interview with Zlatan Ibrahimovic Last Updated: 13/01/17 6:06am Watch as Paul Pogba gatecrashed Thierry Henry’s interview with Paul Pogba ahead of Manchester United v Liverpool on Super Sunday Paul Pogba was a welcome but surprise guest as Thierry Henry interviewed Zlatan Ibrahimovic ahead of Super Sunday. 
The Frenchman arrived towards the end of Henry's chat with the Manchester United striker, ahead of his side's clash with Liverpool on Sunday, live on Sky Sports 1 . 
Having spoken to Ibrahimovic on a range of topics - from his arrival to England, the physicality of the Premier League and fighting back against his critics - the conversation continued with world-record signing Pogba, though with a lighter tone. Man Utd vs Liverpool Get Sky Sports Get a Sky Sports pass 
Ibrahimovic joked he will be back on free-kick duty from this weekend after Pogba hit the post against Hull in the EFL Cup in midweek, and then told the 23-year-old to leave the stage because he was bringing down the ratings. 
Henry : "When are you going to get top goalscorer!" 
Pogba : "Just tell him to give me the free-kicks." 
Ibrahimovic : "Did it go in? No, so I’m taking the next one. I said to him, if you score, I’ll leave it for you, but you will get one possibility. I was watching and hoping it went in. I’m sorry Pog! But it will come." Upgrade to Sky Sports now and get 9 months half price. Hurry, offer ends January 16th! 
Pogba : "I’ll leave you guys, you are two legends." 
Ibrahimovic: "You just put down the ratings, so leave the stage! We lost followers now, so leave so we can get followers back!" 
Watch the exchange between Pogba, Ibrahimovic and Henry in the video above Also See:
